idea: Indian cuisine is a natural part of the diet in the markets in which the GLOBAL BIRYANI & GRILLS operate. We continue to offer new menu options, both vegetarian and non-vegetarian, largely based on Indian cuisine and use seasonal customer preferences to introduce new dishes. We also run popular food festivals at our Restaurant, thereby offering our customers a range of Indian and international cuisines. Our core values prioritise being customer-focused to provide excellent products and service and employee-focused by maintaining a superior quality work environment.
name: GLOBAL BIRYANI & GRILLS (OPC) PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: We are building technology-enabled products and solutions so that advisors can provide customized portfolios and investment insights to their clients. We do the groundwork and using that distributors and advisors can focus on building their business. We want to empower financial advisors with intelligent advice, market and product knowledge, and, access to differentiated products so that they can serve their clients better and help them manage their wealth the way it should be managed. We believe that by equipping advisors with the best tools to solve clients wealth problems, we can help clients in growing their wealth better, together.
name: BeyondIRR

idea:
A saga of handicrafts penned with various mediums like wood, clay, marble, threads, a plethora of fabrics & much more by highly skilled artisans which are later sent to you after amalgamating your preferences, stories, and experiences via our customized unique handcrafted products.

We collaborate with some amazing, environmentally-conscious artisans to source the best-handcrafted products curated on Guddee.

We believe in creating livelihood for artisans and women in set NGOs thereby brainstorm possible handcrafted products utilizing their skill sets to create what could fit perfectly in your scheme of style and functional requirement.

A unique product for you or your loved one will be a gift for many!
name: AME ARTISTS NETWORK PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Matference Technologies India Pvt. Ltd is focused on e-commerce driven marketplaces that promote grassroot engagement. Its Bizcarver marketplace focuses on grassroot engagement of social and cultural markets with worldwide customers. Its Dharmadiary marketplace engages religious workers with worldwide audience for cultural and spiritual enhancement. Its Researchslide marketplace focuses on engaging commercial small and large businesses directly with their customers in a virtual reality driven framework. Bizcarver and Researchslide is operated under license from Matference Solutions LLC USA. Dharmadiary is operated under license from Intelligence Informatics LLC USA.
name: MATFERENCE TECHNOLOGIES INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED
